original_title: Special two-day opportunity to visit prison inmates
original_body_lines: The Prisons Department has decided to provide a special opportunity for relatives to visit inmates in the prison for two days on the occasion of Vesak Day, Prisons spokesman Chandana Ekanayake said.
He said permission for such visits will be granted for tomorrow (5) and the day after (6).
Accordingly, the relatives of prisoners would be able to provide a parcel of food and sweets brought by them.
Visitors must visit the inmates according to proper health and safety procedures in accordance with prison rules and regulations.
All prison institutions in the country have been provided with the facilities to carry out the activities. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
